name: VERUSCHKA FOUNDATION

address: Flat No. 716, A4 WING, Lok Bharati CHS
Marol Maroshi Road, Marol, Near AFL House/ICICI Bank, Andheri (E)

briefDescription: Our Vision: An inclusive society that accepts, celebrates and empowers individuals with developmental disabilities. Our Mission: We provide sustainable livelihood opportunities for individuals with developmental disabilities and raise awareness by providing a platform to showcase their skills and championing collaborations with fellow change makers.
